sentences.en: ‘Come on,’ Sue said. No one moved.
sentences.cn: “来吧。”休说。但没有人动。

sentences.en: ‘Move along, move along,’ said the constable.
sentences.cn: 警官说：“往前走，别停。”。

sentences.en: ‘Move along, move along,’ said the constable.
sentences.cn: 警官说：“往前走，别停。”。

sentences.en: At Christmas, you couldn’t move for toys in this house (= there were a lot of toys ) .
sentences.cn: 圣诞节的时候，这房子里玩具多得让人都挪不开步。

sentences.en: Becca moved down the steps and into the yard.
sentences.cn: 贝卡走下台阶，来到院子里。

sentences.en: Bob Dole seemed less than enthusiastic about the proposed move.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃·多尔似乎对提议的这项行动不太感兴趣。

sentences.en: Could you move your car, please? It’s blocking the road.
sentences.cn: 你能把车挪一下吗？挡着路了。

sentences.en: each army was waiting for the other side to make a move.
sentences.cn: 双方军队都在等对方先动手。

sentences.en: Eventually the police were called to move them on.
sentences.cn: 终于有人叫来警察驱散他们。

sentences.en: Felix watched his men move like soldiers, spreading out into two teams.
sentences.cn: 费利克斯看着他的手下像士兵一样散开分成了两队。

sentences.en: Good gymnasts rehearse their moves mentally before a competition.
sentences.cn: 优秀的体操运动员赛前都会在心中默默地把动作过一遍。

sentences.en: He made no move to come any nearer.
sentences.cn: 他没有再靠近。

sentences.en: His speech moved the audience to tears .
sentences.cn: 他的演讲让听众感动得落泪。

sentences.en: His speech moved the audience to tears.
sentences.cn: 他的演讲让听众感动得落泪。

sentences.en: I hear she's going to sell out and move to the city.
sentences.cn: 我听说她打算变卖家当，搬到这座城市。

sentences.en: I'm trying to move on and stretch myself with something different.
sentences.cn: 我正想换工作，想尝试点不一样的事情来挑战一下自己。

sentences.en: If the company was to relocate, most employees would move.
sentences.cn: 如果这个公司要搬迁，多数员工也要搬家。

sentences.en: In Germany, the move was welcomed by the Bundesbank president.
sentences.cn: 在德国，联邦银行行长欣然接受了这项措施。

sentences.en: Martin made a move towards the door.
sentences.cn: 马丁朝门口挪了挪。

sentences.en: Most of the council members are reluctant to make such a drastic move.
sentences.cn: 大多数市政会成员不愿采取如此极端的举动。

sentences.en: Mr Gould called for a move towards "one man one vote"
sentences.cn: 古尔德先生号召采取“一人一票制”。

sentences.en: Once the fire has died out, the salvage team will move in.
sentences.cn: 一旦大火熄灭，救援小组就会马上进入。

sentences.en: One false move (= move in the wrong direction ) and I’ll shoot.
sentences.cn: 乱动一下我就开枪。

sentences.en: Paul couldn’t move a muscle (= could not move at all ) – he was so scared.
sentences.cn: 保罗动弹不得——他吓坏了。

sentences.en: Please keep the doors closed while the train is moving.
sentences.cn: 火车行驶时请保持车门关闭。

sentences.en: She’s still thinking about her next move .
sentences.cn: 她还在考虑她的下一步行动。

sentences.en: She’s still thinking about her next move.
sentences.cn: 她还在考虑她的下一步行动。

sentences.en: So, if we could just move onto something else?
sentences.cn: 那么我们可不可以干脆谈点别的？

sentences.en: Taking the position was a good career move (= a decision that will improve the type of jobs you can do).
sentences.cn: 接受这个职位在事业上是走对了一步。

sentences.en: The authorities have made no move to resolve the conflict.
sentences.cn: 当局没有采取任何措施来解决冲突。

sentences.en: The bar was so crowded you could hardly move .
sentences.cn: 酒吧很挤，人都难以挪动。

sentences.en: The clay court was slippery and he was unable to move freely.
sentences.cn: 红土网球场很滑，他不能自如地移动。

sentences.en: the Mounties briskly ordered them to move on.
sentences.cn: 加拿大骑警不客气地命令他们走开。

sentences.en: The move follows growing public concern over the spread of the disease.
sentences.cn: 针对公众对该疾病的不断蔓延日益担忧，从而出台了这一举措。

sentences.en: The move was immediately challenged by two of the republics.
sentences.cn: 此项动议立即遭到其中两个共和国的反对。

sentences.en: They would move heaven and earth to stop me if they could.
sentences.cn: 可能的话，他们会千方百计地阻止我。

sentences.en: We’ve moved seven or eight times in the last five years.
sentences.cn: 在过去五年里我们搬了七八次家。

sentences.en: What's wrong with his wanting to sell his land and move on?
sentences.cn: 他想卖掉土地离开这里，这有什么错呢？

sentences.en: you're here to work, so get moving.
sentences.cn: 你来这儿是干活的，那就快干。

words.tran_cn: 动产的；可移动的；不固定的
原动力；鼓动者；搬运公司；搬家工人
移动，移动到；感动（move的过去式，过去分词）

phrases.phrase: make a move on (或 put the moves on)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)向（某人）提出想法（尤指性要求）
（尤指为避免拥堵而）向前走，继续前进
v. 走来走去；绕着……来回转
向前移动，提步向前；向前发展
使从…中醒悟过来；从…搬走，离开…
搬进：开始占据一个住宅地或商业场所
在活动中，在进行中；四处奔波

trans.tran_cn: 行动，移动，改变，搬家，步骤，一步(棋)
trans.tran_en: something that you decide to do in order to achieve something
to change from one place or position to another, or to make something do this

trans.tran_cn: 移动，改变，进步，采取行动，搬家，调动，走棋，转移话题，动摇，促使，感动，提议
trans.tran_en: to change from one place or position to another, or to make something do this
